GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:id.description: serves an object with article of specified id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the article of specified id

exampleResponse.body: This is a bad article name
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Receives an object with username and body properties, adds a new comment and and serves an object with comment of that has been added to the article of article_id

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Receives and object with a votes property and updates the votes property of the article with article_id. It serves an object with the updated article
